            "language": [["Plain Text"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "class TranscactionProcessorWorker extends AbstractWorker {\n    private $transactions;\n\n    protected function getMemoryLimit() {\n        return \"512M\";\n    }\n\n    protected function prepareMain() {\n        $stmt = $this->pdo->query(\"SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE processed = 0 LIMIT 500\");\n        $stmt->execute();\n        $this->transactions = $stmt->fetchAll();\n    }\n\n    protected function main() {\n        foreach ($this->transactions as $transaction) {\n            // Could throw some PDO or MYSQL exception, but that is handled by the AbstractWorker\n            $stmt = $this->pdo->query(\"UPDATE transactions SET processed = 1 WHERE id = {$transaction['id']} LIMIT 1\");\n            $stmt->execute();\n        }\n    }\n}"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 5

          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["Plain Text"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "abstract class AbstractWorker implements Worker {\n    protected $pdo;\n    protected $logger;\n\n    public function __construct(PDO $pdo, Logger $logger) {\n        $this->pdo = $pdo;\n        $this->logger = $logger;\n    }\n\n    public function run() {\n        try {\n            $this->setMemoryLimit($this->getMemoryLimit());\n            $this->logger->log(\"Preparing main\");\n            $this->prepareMain();\n            $this->logger->log(\"Executing main\");\n            $this->main();\n        } catch (Throwable $e) {\n            // Catch and rethrow all errors so they can be logged by the worker\n            $this->logger->log(\"Worker failed with exception: {$e->getMessage()}\");\n            throw $e;\n        }\n    }\n\n    private function setMemoryLimit($memoryLimit) {\n        ini_set('memory_limit', $memoryLimit);\n        $this->logger->log(\"Set memory limit to $memoryLimit\");\n    }\n\n    abstract protected function getMemoryLimit();\n\n    abstract protected function prepareMain();\n\n    abstract protected function main();\n}"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 5
        }
      },

          "properties": {
            "title": [
              [
                "When inheriting from an abstract class, all methods marked abstract in the parent’s class declaration must be defined by the child (or the child itself must also be marked abstract); additionally, these methods must be defined with the same (or a less restricted) visibility. For example, if the abstract method is defined as protected, the function implementation must be defined as either protected or public, but not private."
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",

          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "title": [
              [
                "Fatal error: Class X contains 1 abstract method and must therefore be declared abstract or implement the remaining methods (X::x) in"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "quote",
          "version": 1
        }
      },
      "af6a835d-5354-4eec-b3a2-08bca918666e": {
        "role": "comment_only",
        "value": {
          "alive": true,
          "created_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",

          "properties": {
            "title": [
              ["First of all, we have provided an abstract method "],
              ["getMemoryLimit()", [["c"]]],
              [". Any class extending from "],
              ["AbstractWorker", [["c"]]],
              [
                " needs to provide this method and return its memory limit. The "
              ],
              ["AbstractWorker", [["c"]]],
              [" then sets the memory limit and logs it."]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",

          "version": 1

      "eaae214d-80aa-4be8-8420-34605e0113eb": {
        "role": "comment_only",
        "value": {
          "alive": true,
          "created_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_table": "notion_user",
          "created_time": 1552022363083,
          "id": "eaae214d-80aa-4be8-8420-34605e0113eb",
          "ignore_block_count": true,
          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_table": "notion_user",
          "last_edited_time": 1552022363083,
          "parent_id": "b1864cfa-b2e4-4763-a818-d7b2c818bb3d",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "title": [
              ["Finally, all of these method calls have been grouped in a "],
              ["try", [["c"]]],
              ["-"],
              ["catch", [["c"]]],
              [
                " block. So if any of the abstract methods defined by the child class throws an exception, we will catch that exception, log it and rethrow it. This prevents all child classes from having to implement this themselves."
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "text",
          "version": 1
        }
      },
      "ee5af379-8907-446a-b3f8-45a4c8c4b7c8": {
        "role": "comment_only",
        "value": {
          "alive": true,
          "created_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_table": "notion_user",
          "created_time": 1552022363082,

              ],

              [
                " method from the interface, but specifies some abstract methods that need to be filled in by any child class:"
              ]
